> **NOTE** <br>
> PaperCut does not jailbreak devices directly. It only assists with installing community made Kindle modifications. <br><br>
> We **don't** make the modifications so **don't contact us** if you have any **legal issues**.

<h2>What is PaperCut?</h2>
<p>
PaperCut is a lightweight, cross-platform desktop installer for Kindle jailbreaks, hotfixes, and other mods.

Built with **NeutralinoJS**, PaperCut avoids large resource intensive builds and is inspired by the GNOME Human Interface Guidelines.
</p>

<h2>Features</h2>

- **Automatic Kindle detection**
- Install options:
  - Jailbreaks ( WinterBreak, WinterBreak2, AdBreak )
  - Hotfix ( HAKT )
  - Disable ADs
  - PEKI
  - MPRI
  - KUAL
  - KindleForge
  - KOReader
  - KTerm
  - KoSSH 
  - screenControl
- Step by step instructions
- Lightweight for quick download
- Cross-platform (macOS, Windows, Linux)

<h2>Dependencies</h2>

- **NeutralinoJS** - Lightweight and portable desktop application development framework.

<h2>Development Installation</h2>

```bash
npm run setup
```

<h3>Dev Mode ( Hot Reload )</h3>

```bash
npm run dev
```

<h3>Building Binaries</h3>

```bash
npm run build-win
npm run build-mac
npm run build-linux
```
Output binaries will be placed in the `dist/` directory.

<h2>Contributors</h2>
<p>All contributions are welcome but please make sure you arn't vibe coding large parts of your code. This will just require a rewrite later and ends up taking more time.</p>
